statements: SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage;
SELECT threat_id, threat_type FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT threat_description FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT DISTINCT threat_source FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage WHERE threat_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT threat_id, threat_description FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage WHERE threat_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT threat_id, threat_type, threat_source FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage WHERE threat_source LIKE '%APT%';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage WHERE threat_type = 'Phishing' ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(threat_date) AS latest_threat_date FROM ThreatIntelligenceStorage;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligence;
SELECT ID, ThreatName, ThreatType FROM ThreatIntelligence;
SELECT ThreatName, ThreatType, ThreatDescription FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE AnalyzedBy = 'Analyst1';
SELECT * FROM ThreatReports ORDER BY ReportDate DESC;
SELECT ThreatName, ThreatType, AnalyzedBy FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE AnalysisDate >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE ThreatName = 'Malware'
SELECT ID, ThreatName, ThreatType FROM ThreatIntelligence ORDER BY ThreatType DESC
SELECT ThreatName, ThreatDescription FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE ThreatType = 'Phishing' AND AnalyzedBy IS NOT NULL
SELECT ThreatName, AnalysisDate FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE ThreatDescription IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalThreats FROM ThreatIntelligence
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_id, threat_name, threat_date FROM threats WHERE threat_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_id, actor_name, actor_country FROM threat_actors WHERE actor_type = 'Hacker';
SELECT * FROM threat_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats WHERE threat_description IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(threat_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM threats;
SELECT threat_name, threat_description FROM threats WHERE threat_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT threat_name, threat_description, threat_date FROM threats ORDER BY threat_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM threat_actors WHERE actor_country='USA';
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS total_threats FROM threat_sources GROUP BY source_name ORDER BY total_threats DESC;
SELECT * FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT actor_id, actor_name FROM ThreatActors WHERE actor_type='Cyber';
SELECT indicator_type, indicator_value FROM Indicators ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Incidents WHERE incident_type='Security';
SELECT mitigation_description FROM Mitigations WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_id, actor_name, actor_type FROM ThreatActors;
SELECT incident_type, incident_description FROM Incidents WHERE incident_status = 'active';
SELECT indicator_id, indicator_type, indicator_value FROM Indicators WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, known_associations FROM ThreatActors WHERE actor_type = 'Nation State';
SELECT * FROM Mitigations ORDER BY implementation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligence;
SELECT threat_type, severity FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT description, reference_url FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE threat_type = 'Malware';
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, status FROM IncidentReports WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT * FROM ThreatIntelligence WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT * FROM IncidentReports WHERE status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT actor_name, country FROM ThreatActors WHERE country IS NOT NULL AND affiliation = 'Government';
SELECT feed_name, last_updated FROM ThreatFeeds WHERE active = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, findings, analyst_name FROM AnalysisResults WHERE review_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY analysis_id ASC;
